string.text:
The SCAR-SC is a subcompact carbine available in 5.56x45mm NATO and .300 Blackout, presented in mid-2018, nearing the line between assault rifle and PDW. It weighs 3.1 kg, has a 7.5 in (190mm) inch barrel, an overall length of 25.7 in (650mm) and a length of 21.1 in (540mm) collapsed and has a pistol grip with no finger rest. It has a lower effective range thant other SCAR models of 200m.
 This is the SCAR-SC .300 model, chambered for .300 Blackout.
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Scopes for Picatinny rail
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] NATO compatible suppressor
